title: Mooagain's Art Page Because I Don't Have Enough Stuff Going On Already
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
.footnotes-footer {display: none;}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

I've been looking for a reason to do more art so I'm glad this SCiPTEMBER thing happened. I'm going to try and get as many of the prompts done as I can, but probably won't do all of them. More art may appear here in the future. 

[[collapsible show="Day One: factory" hide="Day One: factory"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/let-the-factory-fail #LetTheFactoryFail]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/mooagain/The%20Factory%20Twiter.jpg]]

This is my idea of what it looks like on the other side of the screen from that tale, done using pencil and paper as well as a bit of photo editing.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Two: reanimation" hide="Day Two: reanimation"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6550 SCP-6550]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/mooagain/Grey.jpg]]

There's no rule saying I can't draw my own characters for this. Here's Grey, the lich from The Heartwarming Tale Of Thur'lex The Devourer, as the site director at the end of the series.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Three: twisted-pines" hide="Day Three: twisted-pines"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-blackbird-and-the-falcon The Blackbird and The Falcon]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/mooagain/Melting%20Robot.jpg]]

This is one of the best tales on the site, it was nice having the excuse to re-read it and do art for it.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Five: skeletal" hide="Day Five: skeletal"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6292 Don't Beer the Reaper]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/mooagain/Drunk%20Death.jpg]]

This SCP is hilarious, go read it.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Eight: hive-mind" hide="Day Eight: hive-mind"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6757 The Great Mumbo Jumbo]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/mooagain/Mumbo%20Jumbo.jpg]]

A fun story about a magic guy with absolutely no emotional damage.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Twelve: wilsons-wildlife" hide="Day Twelve: wilsons-wildlife"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-zargoth Critter Profile: ZARGOTH, DESTROYER OF DIMENSIONS!]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/mooagain/ZARGOTH%2C%20DESTROYER%20OF%20DIMENSIONS%21.jpg]]

Source image [https://wordpress.org/openverse/image/de62c8af-4e6f-464d-ac27-30c6a8bbc558 here]. Out of all the WWS critter profiles this goofy ##red|LARGE DEMON## is among the best. 

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Day Fifteen: map" hide="Day Fifteen: map"]]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5917 The Map of the Multiverse]

[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/mooagain/Bird%20Scroll.jpg]]

Bird.

[[/collapsible]]
author: Mooagain
